content:
# The stone furnace has been successfully placed at the specified position, and 5 units of coal have been inserted as fuel. 
# However, the furnace is currently unable to operate because it has no ingredients to smelt.

# To utilize the furnace, I need to gather some stone to smelt into stone bricks. 
# I will return to the stone resource and harvest additional stone.

move_to(stone_position)  # Move back to the stone resource position
harvest_resource(stone_position, quantity=5)  # Collect more stone
print(f"Inventory changed to {inspect_inventory()}")  # Check the inventory after harvesting stone. 

# After gathering stone, I will insert it into the furnace to start the smelting process. 
insert_item(Prototype.Stone, furnace, quantity=5)  # Insert 5 units of stone into the furnace
print(f"Furnace status after inserting stone: {inspect_inventory()}")  # Check the inventory and furnace status.
